name: Noir Detective (Jamiex304)
description:
You play Dick Wanye, a P.I who gets a call on a late stormy night. A young songbird name Emma has gone missing and its up to you to find out what happened

Features: 

-2 unique Endings

-A custom build clue system

-Different Locations

Made Using : Unity & Fungus

Note : Made for a college assignment
